body_html: @girving I don't know if this is a reasonable path or not (I may be missing the point) but I wonder if borrowing ideas from SSA https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static_single_assignment_form for manipulating the computation graph in cases where there is a side effect and no return value is a way to achieve this?

body: @girving I don't know if this is a reasonable path or not (I may be missing the point) but I wonder if borrowing ideas from SSA https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static_single_assignment_form for manipulating the computation graph in cases where there is a side effect and no return value is a way to achieve this?
